title: [娱乐][其他]mcMMO1.3.14 —— 技能插件[1.4.6-1.4.7]
author: Chris
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Chris 于 2013-2-2 21:39 编辑 

简介

About mcMMOmcMMO takes core Minecraft game mechanics and expands them to add an extensive RPG experience, the goal of the project has always been a quality RPG experience. Everything in mcMMO is carefully thought out and is constantly improving. mcMMO adds eleven skills to train in and level in, while also offering a high level of customization for server admins. There are countless features, including custom sounds, graphical elements, and more added when running mcMMO in conjunction with Spout. We carefully read feedback and evaluate the mechanics of mcMMO in every update to provide an ever-evolving experience.
If you want an original RPG experience like no other mod out there, mcMMO is for you.


特性

mcMMO Features

Fully featured mmo-like party systemLocalizationRobust SkillsUnique Skill AbilitiesSkill LeaderboardsSkills that focus on fun gameplay rather than restrictionFollows an XP system like in an RPG/MMOAddictiveRepair SystemAdmin ChatLoads of RPG elementsVery Configurable - Want to make mining take 3x longer to level? You can.MySQL Support3 Different HUD Styles (XP BARS, ETC)Sound effects added to abilitiesSound effect for LevelingSound effect for RepairLevel-up achievement-style notifications
mcMMO supports the 100% optional SpoutPlugin which allows for client-side modding. For the features in Blue the Spoutcraft Client is required, You can get it here. 

.随便看不看= =

鉴于这货实在没办法去各种翻译...于是我只能抄原文了= =
  话说，如果以前在服务器玩过这种东西的话，应该懂这插件的用处。。【以前似乎也叫mcrpg...
            有兴趣就拿去玩吧= =没兴趣的随便...反正这货我绝对翻译不了..因为，我鸟语0级！


安装、配置、权限
 


[size=230.8%]Installation & Configuration

[size=153.8%]InstallatonSimply put mcMMO.jar in your plugins folder. When you first run mcMMO a configuration file will be generated and placed in a folder called "mcMMO". Edit this configuration file to adjust excavation loot tables, change what the commands are and much more.

[size=153.8%]MySQL Instructions (Optional)Theres 5 settings in the configuration file you will need to change

MySQL DB Name - Put your DB name hereMySQLServer - Put IP hereMySQLdbPass - Password for MySQL hereMySQLuserName - User name for MySQL hereUseMySQL - Change this to true Then start your server and it should be running in MySQL mode, check the server console for any errors. If you see no errors, its working.
[size=153.8%]Permission NodesListed below are all the permission nodes you may use. Note that some nodes are assigned as true by default, and should be negated if you do not want your users to have them.
Updated list here: mcMMO Permissions
[size=76.9%]Grouped Nodes
mcmmo.* - Allows use of every single mcMMO feature and command.mcmmo.defaults - mcMMO permisions that default to truemcmmo.defaultsop - mcMMO permisions that default to true for OPsmcmmo.tools.* - Allows the use of All the Tools permissions.mcmmo.ability.*- Allows the use of all the abilities. True by defaultmcmmo.item.* - Allows the use of the Item permissions.mcmmo.chat.* - Allows all Chat permissions Including Admin chat.mcmmo.skills.* -  Allows all the skills permissions.
[size=76.9%]Single Nodes
mcmmo.admin - Allows use of /mmoupdate for FlatFile -> MySQLmcmmo.tools.mcrefresh - Allows use of /mcrefreshmcmmo.tools.mmoedit - Allows use of /mmoeditmcmmo.tools.mcgod - Allows use of /mcgodmcmmo.regeneration - Allows Power Level based Regenerationmcmmo.item.chimaerawing - Allows use of Chimaera Wingmcmmo.skills.taming - Allows Taming Skillmcmmo.skills.mining - Allows Mining Skillmcmmo.skills.woodcutting - Allows Woodcutting Skillmcmmo.skills.repair - Allows Repair Skillmcmmo.skills.unarmed - Allows Unarmed Skillmcmmo.skills.archery - Allows Archery Skillmcmmo.skills.herbalism - Allows Herbalism Skillmcmmo.skills.excavation - Allows Excavation Skillmcmmo.skills.swords - Allows Swords Skillmcmmo.skills.axes - Allows Axes Skillmcmmo.skills.acrobatics - Allows Acrobatics Skillmcmmo.skills.fishing - Allows Fishing Skillmcmmo.ability.herbalism - Allows Herbalism Skillmcmmo.ability.excavation - Allows Giga Drill Breaker Abilitymcmmo.ability.unarmed - Allows Berserk Abilitymcmmo.ability.mining - Allows Super Breaker Abilitymcmmo.ability.axes - Allows Skull Splitter Abilitymcmmo.ability.swords - Allows Serrated Strikes Abilitymcmmo.ability.woodcutting - Allows Tree Feller Abilitymcmmo.commands.ability - Allows use of /mcabilitymcmmo.commands.myspawn - Allows use of /myspawnmcmmo.commands.setmyspawn - Allows setting your myspawn via bedsmcmmo.commands.ptp - Allows use of /ptpmcmmo.commands.whois - Allows use of /whoismcmmo.commands.party - Allows use of /partymcmmo.chat.adminchat - Allows use of admin chat and /amcmmo.chat.partychat - Allows use of party chat and /p

感谢大兴和那个谁...我忘记了= =不好意思...给我指出有汉化包..虽然我不知道如何使用orz....
汉化包地址：mcMMO.jar\com\gmail\nossr50\locale
看到locale_zh_CN.properties
   使用方法：打开config.yml 然后里面有个 Locale 的...一打开的页面能找到，然后把后面的 en_US 改成 zh_CN就可以了
